entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as a student who is being teased by the Slytherins. He is also referred to as 'He' in the verse of the song.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned alongside Harry and is also referred to as 'She' in the verse of the song.

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is introduced as a person who has squeezed his way through the stands to reach Harry and Hermione. He is described as having an enormous bearded face.

relationships.description: Hagrid asks Harry and Hermione to come with him, suggesting a relationship of accompaniment.
Hagrid requests Harry's accompaniment, indicating a one-way relationship from Hagrid to Harry.
